meanings.definition: To make something neat or stylish.
meanings.sent1: She decided to spif up her room by adding colorful pillows.
meanings.sent2: The fashion designer always knows how to spif up an outfit with the perfect accessories.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to spif up its appearance by grooming itself for hours.
meanings.sent4: The artist used vibrant colors to spif up the dull canvas.
meanings.sent5: With a few simple touches, she managed to spif up the old furniture and make it look new.

meanings.definition: A stylish or attractive person or thing.
meanings.sent1: Everyone admired her as the spif of the party with her elegant dress.
meanings.sent2: The new sports car was the spif of the showroom with its sleek design.
meanings.sent3: The little puppy thought it was the spif of the park with its wagging tail.
meanings.sent4: The bright peacock strutted around like the spif of the zoo.
meanings.sent5: The shiny trophy was the spif of the display case, catching everyone's eye.
